title: HOUR 2- Mike Reiss Oct 05, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Mike Reiss Oct 05, 2020
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan and the Danettes bring listeners up to speed on the Covid-19 outbreak within the Tennessee Titans organization while also previewing the Monday Night Football doubleheader. Also, a certain Los Angeles Lakers star needs to shoot more for the Lakers to take Game 4. Finally, Mike Reiss--who covers the Patriots for ESPN's NFL Nation--joins the program to talk about the challenges facing the New England Patriots as they deal with a Covid-19 scare and playing the Chiefs in Kansas City.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
